metadata.description: The name of the Log Analytics workspace (and Microsoft Sentinel workspace).
The full Resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace (e.g., /subscriptions/<subid>/resourceGroups/<rgname>/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/<wsname>).
Name for the Microsoft Sentinel analytic rule.

properties.displayName: Netskope: High Volume of DLP Incidents Detected
properties.description: Detects a high volume of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) incidents from Netskope web transactions within a 1-hour period. This rule triggers if any DLP incidents are found (threshold > 0), indicating potential policy violations or data exfiltration attempts.
properties.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions5_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where isnotempty(dlp_incident_id)
| summarize IncidentCount = count() by dlp_rule_severity, dlp_rule, user, app, srcip
| where IncidentCount > 0
| extend AccountCustomEntity = user
| extend IPCustomEntity = srcip
| extend CloudApplicationCustomEntity = app

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Netskope: High DLP Incidents - Rule '{{dlp_rule}}' by '{{user}}' on '{{app}}'
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Detected {{IncidentCount}} DLP incidents for rule '{{dlp_rule}}' with severity '{{dlp_rule_severity}}' involving user '{{user}}' and application '{{app}}' from IP '{{srcip}}'.
